Common.cta.title: Ready to start sourcing with confidence?
Common.cta.subtitle: Book a free consultation — no obligations, just clear guidance from our team in China.
Common.cta.reassurance: Response within 24 hours • No hard sell

Hero.headline: Your gateway to Chinese factories — with global delivery made easy.
Hero.subhead: We handle factory sourcing, quality inspections, and worldwide shipping — so you can scale with confidence.
Hero.proof: Verified suppliers • Escrow options • End-to-end logistics

Services.title: From Sourcing to Shipping — We Handle It All
Services.subtitle: Whether you're launching a new product or scaling up operations, we cover the entire supply chain—factory sourcing, quality checks, global logistics, and export consulting.

sourcing.title: Factory Sourcing
sourcing.desc: We connect you with trusted manufacturers tailored to your product, MOQ, and pricing needs.

inspection.title: Quality Inspections
inspection.desc: On-site product checks, factory audits, and pre-shipment inspections for peace of mind.

shipping.title: Shipping & Logistics
shipping.desc: We coordinate freight, customs, documentation, and global container shipping end-to-end.

consulting.title: Export Consulting
consulting.desc: From contracts to compliance — we help you navigate China trade with zero friction.

Why.title: Why Choose Us
Why.subtitle: We understand the risks of overseas sourcing. With vetted partners and boots on the ground, we give you confidence from inquiry to delivery.

verified.title: Verified Factories Only
verified.desc: We source from factories we’ve worked with — no middlemen, no Alibaba guessing.

noMiscomm.title: No Miscommunication
noMiscomm.desc: We speak English, Chinese, and Arabic — and act as your local representative.

presence.title: Real Presence in China
presence.desc: With offices in Guangzhou & HK, we’re on the ground inspecting your orders personally.

pricing.title: Fixed Transparent Pricing
pricing.desc: No shady markups or hidden fees — just clear service rates that scale with you.

end2end.title: End-to-End Sourcing
end2end.desc: From textile to tools — we help clients source clothing, furniture, and industrial goods.

guide.title: You’re Not Alone
guide.desc: We’ve helped 60+ businesses launch and scale — and we guide you every step of the way.

shipping.title: Reliable Shipping
shipping.desc: We coordinate container shipping, customs, and timelines — with weekly updates.

Global.title: Clients in 15+ Countries
Global.subtitle: From Sweden to Saudi Arabia, the UK to the UAE — we’ve supported sourcing for brands across Europe, the Middle East, and North America.

Workflow.title: From inquiry to delivery — our workflow

steps.title: Initial inquiry
steps.desc: Contact factory → Get quotation → Receive sample

steps.title: Packing & customs
steps.desc: Finalize packing details and customs preparation

steps.title: Shipping
steps.desc: Load container and issue export documentation

steps.title: Final delivery
steps.desc: Send all documents and handoff to you

Trust.title: Brands, wholesalers & startups across 15+ countries trust us to deliver

FAQ.title: Frequently asked questions
FAQ.ctaPrefix: Can’t find what you’re looking for?

items.q: What types of products can you help me source?
items.a: We specialize in textiles, clothing, furniture, building materials, and industrial goods — thanks to long-standing factory relationships.

items.q: Do you work with small businesses or only large orders?
items.a: We work with both. While bulk sourcing is our main service, we also support startups placing their first container orders.

items.q: How do I know your factories are legit?
items.a: All factories are verified through personal visits and long-term partnerships. No Alibaba resellers or unverified middlemen.
Yes, we provide weekly updates, shipping documents, and photos from our team in China during inspections.

Footer.about1: Trusted partner for Chinese sourcing and export services.
Footer.about2: We bridge global businesses with vetted manufacturers in China.

Certificate.title: 20+ Years of Verified Operations in China
Certificate.body: Our official business registration certificate from China verifies legal operations since 2004—supporting global brands with compliant sourcing, quality checks, and end-to-end logistics.
Certificate.figcaption: Official registration certificate (sample preview). Personal details redacted.
